assetProfile.address2: Rama 6 Road Phayathai Sub-district Phayathai District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, canned mixed fruits, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, coconut milk products, and dehydrated pineapple core and mango, as well as coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages. Further, it operates 28 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 17 company branches and 11 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
